data.title: The "whale with a 100% win rate since October 11th" has accumulated over $16.75 million in unrealized losses on its long positions in BTC, ETH, and SOL.
data.description: Hyperbot data shows that the "100% win rate whale since 10.11" has suffered a total unrealized loss of over $16.75 million on its long positions in BTC, ETH, and SOL, including: $4.31 million on ETH long positions; $3.27 million on BTC long positions; and $9.16 million on SOL long positions.
